houseRules.notes:
Reception is open daily from 7:00am - 7:00pm. If no one is at the desk, there will be a contact number left.

If you are arriving after 7PM, please contact us and we will arrange to welcome you.

Check in starts at 2pm
Latest check out 10am

Terms and Conditions  
----------------------------------------------
1. House rules, your responsibility and behavior
1.1 We pride ourselves on creating friendly, welcoming and above all safe places for people of all ages to enjoy. Any breaches of our admission, behavior or safety policies will be treated seriously and regarded as a breach of these terms and conditions and can occur at a fee.
1.2 Whether a booking is made by or on behalf of individuals or a group booking, if the behavior of yourself or any member of a party is considered likely to cause danger, damage or offense, we reserve the right at our reasonable discretion to cancel or terminate a stay completely.  If any member of The Marion staff considers that the behavior of any member of your party is unacceptable, they are authorized to end the stay and you will be asked to leave the premises.  Should this situation arise our responsibility for your booking will cease and we will not be obliged to cover any expense which may be incurred by the party concerned, neither will we consider any claim for compensation or refunds. You are responsible for the cost of any damage caused by yourself or your party during your stay; these charges will be levied by and must be paid to The Marion prior to departure. Should any such behavior halt or interrupt The Marion's ability to continue to trade any bed, room or other product, you will be responsible for compensating The Marion in full for all losses directly or indirectly incurred.  Such behavior or damage may lead to civil or criminal proceedings where appropriate. Furthermore by these terms and conditions you agree that The Marion charges $200 on you credit or debit card if there is any special cleaning necessary (for example any body fluids) .  If there is any damage caused by you or your group to the Marion property during your stay The Marion will charge a reasonable estimation of the costs to fix it to your credit card.
1.3 Smoking and vaping is not permitted at any time inside the Hostel and only in the designated smoking areas.
1.4 Tampering with any fire protection device in or around the property including but not limited to fire detectors, fire sprinklers, fire hoses, extinguishers & fire doors will result in fines and / or damages.
1.5 Guests responsible for fire alarm activation will be responsible for the fines applied by the local Fire Department, unless an actual fire emergency has occurred. Note, these alarms can be set off by things such as but not limited to hair dryers, hair straighteners, aerosol cans, steam from showers and tampering of alarms.
1.6 Any minors wishing to stay at the Marion need to have approval from the Marion staff prior to booking. Unfortunately we're not able to accommodate infants or small children.
1.7  Non paying guests are not allowed at the property at any time unless prior approval by reception. Any non paying guests brought to the property outside reception hours or not approved by reception incurs a fee. The person associated with the non-paying guest is liable for any damages done or interruptions by that person.
1.8 It is not allowed to bring any dangerous goods, weapons or drugs etc. to the property.  This will  have the consequences stated in 1.2.
1.9 We do not accept booking for longer than 15 days. Multiple bookings will be turned away.

2. Cancellation, Delay or Failure to Perform
2.1 We will not be liable to you if we are prevented or delayed in the performing of any of our obligations to you if this is due to any cause beyond our reasonable control including (without limitation): an act of God, earthquake, flood, fire or accident; war or civil disturbance; strike, industrial action or stoppages of work; any form of government intervention; a third party act or omission;
2.2 The hostel may at any time cancel a booking if the hostel becomes unavailable due to circumstances outside the hostelâ€™s control or immediate maintenance issues. In this case the hostel is not liable to you and won't perform any obligations of accommodation or relocation.
2.3 The hostel may cancel the booking if the payment details provided by the customer are invalid or insufficient. The hostel will make a reasonable attempt to contact the customer for alternative valid credit card details.

3. Group bookings
3.1 A booking is considered a group booking from 6 people. Group bookings have to get in touch with us immediately after booking, preferable before the booking is made but not later than 48h after the booking. In case of failure to getting in touch, the booking can be cancelled without any further obligations or liability to you. Bookings for more than 8 people are only possible if approved by the management. For group booking inquiries please get in contact with us directly.  Multiple bookings for one group will be turned away.  Group bookings are non-refundable.

4. General Rules, Charges and fees
4.1 We reserve the right to make additional charges/fees as following or if not listed as of reasonable discretion if the rules at the property aren't followed.
4.2 If the guest fails to pay the charges immediately at the property, these charges will be taken from the credit card provided at the time of booking.
We do not like to charge you, our aim is to create a kind, peaceful atmosphere living together and sharing spaces with common sense. This list is just for guests who are disrespectful towards other guests or towards staff if asked to respect the rules. Let's be nice, let's be kind to each other, kia atawhai, noho tahi.
4.3 Payment for the full stay will be charged on the date of arrival. If the provided payment details are invalid or insufficient, we will make a reasonable attempt to contact the guest for alternative payment. Failure to provide valid payment may result in the cancellation of the booking.

Payment Policy:
Valid credit card details are required to confirm your booking. All payments are taken on arrival unless the rate plan you booked states that payment can be taken prior to your arrival. We do not accept any cheques as payment sorry.

To ensure a smooth check-in process, please note that we will take payment for the full amount of your stay on the check-in day. If you'd like to use a different credit card for the payment, please let us know in advance, and we will be more than happy to assist with this request. We want to make sure everything is taken care of so you can relax and enjoy your stay!

Cancellation Policy:  
Standard rate: please give us 24 hours (to the check in date) notice of cancellation to ensure a refund. If not, you will be charged for the first nights accommodation to your credit card.
Non refundable deals: are non refundable and no changes are permitted.

In case of a no show the first night's accommodation will be charged to your credit card and the rest of the booking will be cancelled.
